metadata.name: System Network Connections Discovery - MacOs
metadata.comment: Detects usage of system utilities to discover system network connections

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/who')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/w')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/last')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/lsof')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/netstat'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of system utilities to discover system network connections
